Structure
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
Questionnairehttps://voicecollab.ai/fhir/Questionnaire/dvoicelaryngealdystoniaschema#2.1.0
diagnosis_ld_qeteGold Standard Diagnosis:: Does the patient have laryngeal dystonia as determined by qualitative expert team evaluation? (Select all that apply).0..1string
diagnosis_ld_assessmentDid the patient have the following assessment? (Select all that apply).0..1string
diagnosis_ld_ds2. Disease Subtypes: (Select all that apply).: diagnosis_ld_ds0..1string
diagnosis_ld_etiologyEtiology: What is the etiology?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
diagnosis_ld_etiology_otherPlease specify0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_ld_etiology = 'other'
diagnosis_ld_etiology_ccDoes the patient have any of the following concomitant conditions? (Select all that apply).0..1string
diagnosis_ld_etiology_cc_otherOther type of dystonia0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_ld_etiology_cc = '1'
diagnosis_ld_degree_text4. Disease Severity: Degree of dysphonia CAPE-V scale0..1string
diagnosis_ld_degree_legendLegend:C- Sonsistent I = IntermittentMI = Mildly DeviantMO = Moderately DeviantSE = Severely Deviant0..1string
diagnosis_ld_degree_os_1Overall Severity0..1string
diagnosis_ld_degree_os_2Overall Severity0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
diagnosis_ld_degree_r_1Roughness0..1string
diagnosis_ld_degree_r_2Roughness0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
diagnosis_ld_degree_b_1Breathiness0..1string
diagnosis_ld_degree_b_2Breathiness0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
diagnosis_ld_degree_s_1Strain0..1string
diagnosis_ld_degree_s_2Strain0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
diagnosis_ld_degree_p_1Pitch0..1string
diagnosis_ld_degree_p_naturePitch (Indicate the nature of the abnormality):0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_ld_degree_p_1 > 0
diagnosis_ld_degree_p_2Pitch0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
diagnosis_ld_degree_l_1Loudness0..1string
diagnosis_ld_degree_l_natureLoudness (Indicate the nature of the abnormality):0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_ld_degree_l_1 > 0
diagnosis_ld_degree_l_2Loudness0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
diagnosis_ld_degree_commentsComments about resonance0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
diagnosis_ld_degree_comments_otherPlease specify0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_ld_degree_comments = 'other'
diagnosis_ld_degree_comments_other_2Additional Features (for example, diplophonia, fry, falsetto, asthenia, aphonia, pitch instability, tremor, wet/gurgly, or other relevant terms):0..1string
diagnosis_ld_treatment5. Treatment obtained: Has the patient undergone any treatment for their condition?0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
diagnosis_ld_treatment_selectSelect all that apply:0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_ld_treatment = 'yes'
diagnosis_ld_treatment_bi_liWhen was the last injection?0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_ld_treatment_select = '1'
diagnosis_ld_treatment_otherOther, please specify0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_ld_treatment_select = '1'

Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for diagnosis_ld_etiology

  • Idiopathic
  • Familial
  • Trauma
  • Unknown
  • Other

Answer options for diagnosis_ld_degree_os_2

  • Consistent
  • Intermittent

Answer options for diagnosis_ld_degree_r_2

  • Consistent
  • Intermittent

Answer options for diagnosis_ld_degree_b_2

  • Consistent
  • Intermittent

Answer options for diagnosis_ld_degree_s_2

  • Consistent
  • Intermittent

Answer options for diagnosis_ld_degree_p_2

  • Consistent
  • Intermittent

Answer options for diagnosis_ld_degree_l_2

  • Consistent
  • Intermittent

Answer options for diagnosis_ld_degree_comments

  • Normal
  • Other

Answer options for diagnosis_ld_treatment

  • Yes
  • No

item.text:
Gold Standard Diagnosis:: Does the patient have laryngeal dystonia as determined by qualitative expert team evaluation?
(Select all that apply).

Did the patient have the following assessment?
(Select all that apply).

2. Disease Subtypes: 
(Select all that apply).: diagnosis_ld_ds

Does the patient have any of the following concomitant conditions?
(Select all that apply).

4. Disease Severity: Degree of dysphonia

CAPE-V scale
Legend:C- Sonsistent I = IntermittentMI = Mildly DeviantMO = Moderately DeviantSE = Severely Deviant

Pitch
(Indicate the nature of the abnormality):

Loudness
(Indicate the nature of the abnormality):

Additional Features
(for example, diplophonia, fry, falsetto, asthenia, aphonia, pitch instability, tremor, wet/gurgly, or other relevant terms):
5. Treatment obtained: Has the patient undergone any treatment for their condition?
